game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Cursed Tomb
game.description: The ancient artifact is said to possess great power and must be retrieved from the Cursed Tomb before it falls into the wrong hands

tasks.objective: Find the entrance of the Cursed Tomb
tasks.description: Use the ancient map to find the entrance of the Cursed Tomb located deep within the Forest of Shadows
You must defeat the tomb guardians to reach the inner chamber where the artifact is kept
Once the guardians are defeated, retrieve the artifact from the inner chamber
